section.p:
You are washed up on to a pebble beach, gasping for breath, and only half-conscious. You are barely aware of grasping hands rifling through your things. You have been found by wreckers. You lose
all your possessions and money
- cross them off your Adventure Sheet.
When you come to, you have been dragged up the beach, beneath towering cliffs. You have probably been washed up on the shores of Nerech, the Land of the Manbeasts. .
